caption:
“The cloistered heart beats louder in heaven.”

Reflection:
Hidden lives of devotion echo beyond time. In unseen obedience, the soul learns heaven’s rhythm.

Commentary:
This line honors the quiet saints — those who love in silence. God hears what the world overlooks, and such faith resounds eternally.
